alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 4:24PM CDT until April 26 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Tyler to near Troup, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Kilgore, Whitehouse, Overton, Troup, New London, Arp, Turnertown, Joinerville, New Chapel Hill, Rolling Meadows and Laird Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
